name: Lucas
text: Hello! Hello! It's Lucas Anguerra calling from planet Nera!

name: Narrator
text: Some bips are heard, no voices

name: Narrator
text: He continue for some hours, until someone responds

name: Voice
text: Hello, Mister Anguerra, help is comming, go to the commanding room to be saved.

name: Narrator
text: He recompose himself, he is saved, just have to open the last door.
